about.title: About the Artist
about.description: Ahmed Daghlis, a contemporary Arab artist based in France, combines authenticity and modernity in his works. He began his artistic journey since childhood, and his talent developed through years of study and practice.
about.quote: Art is not just colors on canvas, but a language spoken by the soul. Through my works, I strive to convey genuine human emotions and revive beauty in a world that needs more hope and inspiration.
about.awardsDesc: Recipient of 5 local and European awards
